verses.verse: Now when the people<WH5971> saw<WH7200> that Moses<WH4872> delayed<WH954> to come<WH3381> down<WH3381> from the mountain,<WH2022> the people<WH5971> assembled<WH6950> about<WH5921> Aaron,<WH175> and said<WH559> to him, "Come,<WH6965> make<WH6213> us a god<WH430> who<WH834> will go<WH1980> before<WH6440> us; as for this<WH2088> Moses,<WH4872> the man<WH376> who<WH834> brought<WH5927> us up from the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> we do not know<WH3045> what<WH4100> has become<WH1961> of him."

And Aaron<WH175> said<WH559> to them, "Tear<WH6561> off<WH6561> the gold<WH2091> rings<WH5141> which<WH834> are in the ears<WH241> of your wives,<WH802> your sons,<WH1121> and your daughters,<WH1323> and bring<WH935> [them] to me."

So the next<WH4283> day<WH4283> they rose<WH7965> early<WH7925> and offered<WH5927> burnt<WH5930> offerings,<WH5930> and brought<WH5066> peace<WH8002> offerings;<WH8002> and the people<WH5971> sat<WH3427> down<WH3427> to eat<WH398> and to drink,<WH8354> and rose<WH6925> up to play.<WH6711>

Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> "Go<WH1980> down<WH1980> <WH3381> at once,<WH3381> for your people,<WH5971> whom<WH834> you brought<WH5927> up from the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> have corrupted<WH7843> [themselves.]

They have made<WH6213> for themselves a molten<WH4541> calf,<WH5695> and have worshiped<WH7812> it, and have sacrificed<WH2076> to it, and said,<WH559> 'This<WH428> is your god,<WH430> O Israel,<WH3478> who<WH834> brought<WH5927> you up from the land<WH776> of Egypt!<WH4714>'"
And the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> "I have seen<WH7200> this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> and behold,<WH2009> they are an obstinate<WH7186> <WH6203> people.<WH5971>

"Now<WH6258> then let<WH5117> Me alone,<WH5117> that My anger<WH639> may burn<WH2734> against them, and that I may destroy<WH3615> them; and I will make<WH6213> of you a great<WH1419> nation.<WH1471>"

"Why<WH4100> should the Egyptians<WH4714> speak,<WH559> saying,<WH559> 'With evil<WH9567> [intent] He brought<WH3318> them out to kill<WH2026> them in the mountains<WH2022> and to destroy<WH3615> them from the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>'? Turn<WH7725> from Thy burning<WH2740> anger<WH639> and change<WH5162> Thy mind<WH5162> about<WH5921> [doing] harm<WH9567> to Thy people.<WH5971>

"Remember<WH2142> Abraham,<WH85> Isaac,<WH3327> and Israel,<WH3478> Thy servants<WH5650> to whom<WH834> Thou didst swear<WH7650> by Thyself, and didst say<WH1696> to them, 'I will multiply<WH7235> your descendants<WH2233> as the stars<WH3556> of the heavens,<WH8064> and all<WH3605> this<WH2088> land<WH776> of which<WH834> I have spoken<WH559> I will give<WH5414> to your descendants,<WH2233> and they shall inherit<WH5157> [it] forever.<WH5769>'"

Then Moses<WH4872> turned<WH6437> and went<WH3381> down<WH3381> from the mountain<WH2022> with the two<WH8147> tablets<WH3871> of the testimony<WH5715> in his hand,<WH3027> tablets<WH3871> which were written<WH3789> on both<WH8147> sides;<WH5676> they were written<WH3789> on one<WH2088> [side] and the other.<WH2088>

And it came<WH1961> about, as soon<WH9201> as Moses came<WH7126> near<WH7126> the camp,<WH4264> that he saw<WH7200> the calf<WH5695> and [the] dancing;<WH4246> and Moses' anger<WH639> burned,<WH2734> and he threw<WH7993> the tablets<WH3871> from his hands<WH3027> and shattered<WH7665> them at the foot<WH8478> of the mountain.<WH2022>

And he took<WH3947> the calf<WH5695> which<WH834> they had made<WH6213> and burned<WH8313> [it] with fire,<WH784> and ground<WH2912> it to powder,<WH834> <WH1854> and scattered<WH2219> it over<WH5921> the surface<WH6440> of the water,<WH4325> and made the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> drink<WH8248> [it.]
Then Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to Aaron,<WH175> "What<WH4100> did this<WH2088> people<WH5971> do<WH6213> to you, that you have brought<WH935> [such] great<WH1419> sin<WH2401> upon them?"

"For they said<WH559> to me, 'Make<WH6213> a god<WH430> for us who<WH834> will go<WH1980> before<WH6440> us; for this<WH2088> Moses,<WH4872> the man<WH376> who<WH834> brought<WH5927> us up from the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> we do not know<WH3045> what<WH4100> has become<WH1961> of him.'

"And I said<WH559> to them, 'Whoever<WH4310> has any gold,<WH2091> let them tear<WH6561> it off.<WH6561>' So they gave<WH5414> [it] to me, and I threw<WH7993> it into the fire,<WH784> and out came<WH3318> this<WH2088> calf.<WH5695>"

Now when Moses<WH4872> saw<WH7200> that the people<WH5971> were out of control<WH6544> – for Aaron<WH175> had let them get<WH6544> out of control<WH6544> to be a derision<WH8103> among their enemies<WH6965> –

then Moses<WH4872> stood<WH5975> in the gate<WH8179> of the camp,<WH4264> and said,<WH559> "Whoever<WH4310> is for the Lord,<WH3068> [come] to me!" And all<WH3605> the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> gathered<WH622> together to him.

And he said<WH559> to them, "Thus<WH3541> says<WH1696> the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> 'Every<WH376> man<WH376> [of you] put<WH7760> his sword<WH2719> upon his thigh,<WH3409> and go<WH5674> <WH7725> back<WH7725> and forth<WH5674> from gate<WH8179> to gate<WH8179> in the camp,<WH4264> and kill<WH2026> every<WH376> man<WH376> his brother,<WH251> and every<WH376> man<WH376> his friend,<WH7453> and every<WH376> man<WH376> his neighbor.<WH7453>'"
So the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> did<WH6213> as Moses<WH4872> instructed,<WH1697> and about three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> men<WH376> of the people<WH5971> fell<WH5307> that day.<WH3117>

Then Moses<WH4872> said,<WH559> "Dedicate<WH4390> yourselves<WH3027> today<WH3117> to the Lord<WH3068> – for every<WH376> man<WH376> has been against his son<WH1121> and against his brother<WH251> – in order that He may bestow<WH5414> a blessing<WH1293> upon you today.<WH3117>"

And it came<WH1961> about on the next<WH4283> day<WH4283> that Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> "You yourselves<WH9043> have committed<WH2398> a great<WH1419> sin;<WH2401> and now<WH6258> I am going<WH5927> up to the Lord,<WH3068> perhaps<WH194> I can make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for your sin.<WH9128>"

"But now,<WH6258> if<WH518> Thou wilt, forgive<WH5375> their sin<WH9128> – and if<WH518> not, please<WH4994> blot<WH4229> me out from Thy book<WH5612> which<WH834> Thou hast written!<WH3789>"

"But go<WH1980> now,<WH6258> lead<WH5148> the people<WH5971> where<WH413> <WH834> I told<WH1696> you. Behold,<WH2009> My angel<WH4397> shall go<WH1980> before<WH6440> you; nevertheless in the day<WH3117> when I punish,<WH6485> I will punish<WH6485> them for their sin.<WH9128>"
